EmailTemplate.name: VACPAC
EmailTemplate.subject: Your vacation package has been processed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for visiting Subscriber Services. Your vacation package request has been processed. Your print delivery is scheduled to stop on {!Transaction_Log__c.Stop_Date__c} and all deliveries are scheduled to resume on {!Transaction_Log__c.Start_Date__c}
Don't forget, while you are away you can browse inquirer.com or you can access the Inquirer and Daily News replica editions from anywhere, at any time!
Have questions? We're here to help!
215-222-2765 | digitalsupport@inquirer.com
Monday- Friday: 6:30 a.m - 3:00 p.m.
Saturday-Sunday: 7:30 a.m. - 12:00 p.m.
You are receiving this email because you are a subscriber of The Philadelphia Inquirer Philadelphia Inquirer, 801 Market Street, Suite 300, Philadelphia, PA 19107 About Inquirer.com | Terms of Use and Privacy Policy | Copyright Â© The Philadelphia Inquirer LLC
